text:
Today we are standing in front of Malaysia's
most iconic building the Petronas Towers.

There are lots of different vantage points
around the park so that you can get your shot

with the Petronas Towers and this is one of
them.

The Petronas towers took six years to build
and they were the tallest building in Asia

I've been to Tapei 101 and these are more
impressive.

These towers were designed by an Argentinean
architect names Caesar Pelli - represent!
Oh because I grew up in Argentina.

The double decker sky bridge here connects
to the two towers together.

My question is this a water fountain or can
I actually go swimming in there.
